Weekly Schedule

  • Lecture: Tuesdays and Thursdays, 4:00 pm - 5:45 pm in Klaus 1447
  • Office hours: Wednesdays, 1:00pm - 3:00pm, CCB 133

Lecture Schedule

  • PG means Pro Git
  • CC means Clean Code, by Robert C. Martin
  • ASD means Agile Software Development, by Robert C. Martin
  • GoF means Design Patterns (GoF is short for "Gang of Four," the informal name for the authors of Design Patterns).
